meanings.definition: The quality or state of being heedless; lack of care or attention.
meanings.sent1: Her heedlessness in handling fragile items often led to accidents.
meanings.sent2: The heedlessness of the students resulted in a messy classroom.
meanings.sent3: Despite his heedlessness, he somehow managed to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent4: The heedlessness of the driver almost caused a collision on the road.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of her heedlessness were evident in the broken vase.

meanings.definition: An act or instance of being heedless; negligence.
meanings.sent1: The manager's heedlessness in checking the inventory caused a shortage of supplies.
meanings.sent2: The heedlessness of the hiker led to getting lost in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about his own heedlessness in forgetting his own jokes.
meanings.sent4: The heedlessness of the politician resulted in a public relations disaster.
meanings.sent5: The heedlessness of the chef in following the recipe ruined the dish.
